intros p n x Hprime H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment p, n, x : nat Hprime : is_prime p H1 : divides (power x n) p Unable to unify "exists q : nat, power ?M1422 ?M1421 = ?M1422 * q" with "exists q : nat, x = power x n * q".

ctx: intros p n x Hprime H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment p, n, x : nat Hprime : is_prime p H1 : divides (power x n) p Unable to unify "?M1421 = 0%Z" with "exists q : nat, x = power x n * q".
